name: fullstackbullettin-website
description: The source code for fullstackbulletin.com website

scripts.test: echo 'Well... we will do it live for now'
scripts.compile:utilities: rimraf build-utilities/compiled/* && babel --presets es2015 -d build-utilities/compiled build-utilities/src
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:svg-icons-sprite && npm run convert:data && npm run compile:utilities && npm run create:icons-list
scripts.refresh:views: npm run convert:data && npm run build:views
scripts.dev:build:css: npm run dev:compile:scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.dev:build:assets: npm-run-all copy:* && npm run dev:build:css && npm run build:views && npm run dev:build:js
scripts.dev:build: npm run build && npm run dev:build:assets
scripts.dev:start: npm run dev:build && npm run serve
scripts.prod:compile:scss: node-sass --source-map-embed true --output-style compressed -o dist/css assets/scss --include-path node_modules --functions ./settings/scss.js
scripts.prod:build:css: npm run prod:compile:scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.prod:build:assets: npm-run-all copy:* && npm run prod:build:images && npm run prod:build:css && npm run build:views && npm run prod:build:js
scripts.prod:build: npm run build && npm run prod:build:assets
scripts.watch:all: npm-run-all -p watch:data watch:css watch:views watch:icons watch:js
scripts.prod:start: npm run prod:build && npm run serve
